author: abstractalgorithms
message:
Add new technology posts and reorganize existing content

- Created new draft posts on various technology topics including load balancers, data structures, system reliability metrics, video transcoding, and X.509 certificates.
- Added a comprehensive guide on probabilistic data structures for big data efficiency.
- Introduced new posts related to UUID versions and micro frontends in web development.
- Implemented a script to reorganize posts based on metadata, improving content structure.
- Updated package.json to streamline build processes and removed deprecated scripts.
- Updated version information to reflect the latest build and commit details.
